name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $url
desc: Returns: An absolute URI that is used to identify this test script when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at which an authoritative instance of this test script is (or will be) published. This URL can be the target of a canonical reference. It SHALL remain the same when the test script is stored on different servers.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this test script when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at which an aut

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: A formal identifier that is used to identify this test script when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this test script when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

name: $::version
desc: Returns: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the test script when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the test script author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the test script when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the test script author and is not expected to be globally unique. For exampl

name: $::name
desc: Returns: A natural language name identifying the test script. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying the test script. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

name: $title
desc: Returns: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the test script.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the test script.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of this test script. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of this test script. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

name: $experimental
desc: Returns: A Boolean value to indicate that this test script is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing) and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A Boolean value to indicate that this test script is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing) and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

name: $date
desc: Returns: The date  (and optionally time) when the test script was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the test script changes.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the test script was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the test script changes

name: $publisher
desc: Returns: The name of the organization or individual that published the test script.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The name of the organization or individual that published the test script.

name: $contact
desc: Returns: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $addcontact
desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A free text natural language description of the test script from a consumer's perspective.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the test script from a consumer's perspective.

name: $useContext
desc: Returns: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate test script instances.

name: $adduseContext
desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate test script instances.

name: $jurisdiction
desc: Returns: A legal or geographic region in which the test script is intended to be used.

name: $addjurisdiction
desc: A legal or geographic region in which the test script is intended to be used.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the test script is intended to be used.

name: $purpose
desc: Returns: Explanation of why this test script is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Explanation of why this test script is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

name: $copyright
desc: Returns: A copyright statement relating to the test script and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the test script.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the test script and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the test script.

name: $origin
desc: Returns: An abstract server used in operations within this test script in the origin element.

name: $addorigin
desc: An abstract server used in operations within this test script in the origin element.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An abstract server used in operations within this test script in the origin element.

name: $destination
desc: Returns: An abstract server used in operations within this test script in the destination element.

name: $adddestination
desc: An abstract server used in operations within this test script in the destination element.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An abstract server used in operations within this test script in the destination element.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The required capability must exist and are assumed to function correctly on the FHIR server being tested.

name: $fixture
desc: Returns: Fixture in the test script - by reference (uri). All fixtures are required for the test script to execute.

name: $addfixture
desc: Fixture in the test script - by reference (uri). All fixtures are required for the test script to execute.

lvardefs.name: objRef

name: $profile
desc: Returns: Reference to the profile to be used for validation.

name: $addprofile
desc: Reference to the profile to be used for validation.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Reference to the profile to be used for validation.

name: $variable
desc: Returns: Variable is set based either on element value in response body or on header field value in the response headers.

name: $addvariable
desc: Variable is set based either on element value in response body or on header field value in the response headers.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Variable is set based either on element value in response body or on header field value in the response headers.

name: $setup
desc: Returns: A series of required setup operations before tests are executed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A series of required setup operations before tests are executed.

name: $test
desc: Returns: A test in this script.

name: $addtest
desc: A test in this script.

name: $teardown
desc: Returns: A series of operations required to clean up after all the tests are executed (successfully or otherwise).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A series of operations required to clean up after all the tests are executed (successfully or otherwise).
